name: Gravity core
description: Space is for everybody. It’s not just for a few people in science or math, or for a select group of astronauts. That’s our new frontier out there, and it’s everybody’s business to know about space.
author: Wallhut

name: Astronaut
description: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.
author: Wallhut

name: Seeker
description: When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
author: Wallhut

name: Seeker
description: When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
author: Wallhut

name: Seeker
description: When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
author: Wallhut

name: Seeker
description: When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
author: Wallhut

name: Splended
description: The habit patterns of the human mind are very strong and make it seem that the hard way is easy and the easy way is hard.
author: Wallhut

name: Splend
description: Time is an encoded pattern of fabric woven with information & energy.
author: Wallhut

name: Praise
description: There's a sunrise and a sunset every single day, and they're absolutely free. Don't miss so many of them.
author: Wallhut

name: Glimmer
description: Ô, Sunlight! The most precious gold to be found on Earth.
author: Wallhut

name: Gleam
description: Ô, Sunlight! The most precious gold to be found on Earth.
author: Wallhut

name: Take care
description: Our bodies are our gardens, to the which our wills are gardeners.
author: Wallhut

name: Say yes
description: You must go on adventures to find out where you truly belong.
author: Wallhut

name: Creative
description: Creativity doesn't wait for that perfect moment. It fashions its own perfect moments out of ordinary ones.
author: Wallhut

name: Will be ok
description: Good things are coming down the road, just don’t stop walking.
author: Wallhut

name: You can do it
description: You can do what you have to do, and sometimes you can do it even better than you think you can.
author: Wallhut

name: Hard work
description: What is success? I think it is a mixture of having a flair for the thing that you are doing; knowing that it is not enough, that you have got to have hard work and a certain sense of purpose.
author: Wallhut

name: Splendid
description: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
author: Wallhut
